bibl.title: Il Brothers Poem e l'edizione alessandrina (in margine a P. Sapph. Obbink).
bibl.note: P. Coll. privées [P. Sapph. Obbink] (= M.-P.3 1445.01; LDAB 341738). - Critical edition, textual and exegetical notes, with some reflections on the poems' order in the Alexandrian edition. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Camillo Neri, Il Brothers Poem e l'edizione alessandrina (in margine a P. Sapph. Obbink).

P. Coll. privées [P. Sapph. Obbink] (= M.-P.3 1445.01; LDAB 341738). - Critical edition, textual and exegetical notes, with some reflections on the poems' order in the Alexandrian edition. - Avec résumé en anglais.
